title: CMCC-CM2-VHR4 control-1950 July 1982 blank
description: All values for July 1982 in the first version (v20180705, v20190301 and v20200313) of CMCC-CM2-VHR4 control-1950 were zero. The entire simulation has been retracted, the bad filesv20200917 replaced and then republished with a new version of v20200917.
